      • getSubjectAndBody

        public static EmailTemplate getSubjectAndBody(java.lang.String subjectAndBody,
                              java.lang.String templateFileName,
                              int contentType)
                                       throws com.konakart.app.KKException
        Extract the subject and body from the supplied String that should contain the subject and the body. The subject should be placed on the first line that should be terminated by a line terminator (either "\r\n" or "\n").

        The extracted items are returned in the EmailTemplate object.

        Parameters:
        subjectAndBody -
        templateFileName - supplied only to provide context information in error messages and exceptions
        contentType -
        Returns:
        the EmailTemplate object populated after parsing the subjectAndBody
        Throws:
        com.konakart.app.KKException

      • getContentTypeOfTemplate

        public static int getContentTypeOfTemplate(java.lang.String subjectAndBody,
                           java.lang.String templateFileName)
                                    throws com.konakart.app.KKException
        Try to determine the contentType of the template.

        The logic is fairly crude; if we find HTML or DOCTYPE tags we assume it's HTML, otherwise plain text.

        Parameters:
        subjectAndBody -
        templateFileName - supplied only to provide context information in error messages and exceptions
        Returns:
        the content type derived by parsing the subjectAndBody String
        Throws:
        com.konakart.app.KKException
